bike.description: Blend of high and mid modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite M30/T700 lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin SST seat stays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger. Compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables.

components.description: Jamis Xenith Team level, high modulus carbon fiber, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
American Classic 420 Aero 3 wheelset, 18/24H, 34mm aero rims, RD-205/Micro 58 hubs with stainless steel cartridge bearings including QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes
Vittoria Diamante Pro Radiale, 700 x 22c, folding
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 electronic IRD-9070 rear and Dura Ace IFD-9070 braze-on front with Shimano 34.9mm clamp
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 electronic IST-9070 shifters, 22-Speed
Ritchey WCS Logic Curve, 7050 triple-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey WCS 4-Axis, 3D net forged 2014 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
Shimano Dura Ace BR-9000 Super SLR dual pivot calipers with cartridge pads and Shimano Dura Ace IST-9070 Di2 STI carbon brake levers
